entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
